ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Giarrusso,Erik Larsen,Brent Engstrom,Erik Larsen,Brent Engstrom,Chris Giarrusso
ComicInfo.Summary: He has the power - the power to transform everything he touches to chocolate! He's the Candyman and his power is more deadly than you'd ever suspect (and fattening too, come to think of it). Our usual tangle of action, romance, laffs and wacky hijinks. Dragon eats a hamburger! A nice self-contained issue. A great jumping on place for new readers!
ComicInfo.Tags: Angel Murphy,Damian Pinscher,Candy-man,Mr. Glum,Powerhouse,Smasher,Widow,Frank Darling,Savage Dragon,Baxter,Octopus,Sparky,G-Man,FirePower,Rock,Fetus Genius
ComicInfo.Title: Candy Man!; Those Who Would Destroy Us; Try This; Invisible Enemies!
